title: 81/408/EEC: Commission Decision of 22 April 1981 on the adjustment of the boundaries of less-favoured areas within the meaning of Council Directive 75/268/EEC (France) (Only the French text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 22 April 1981 on the adjustment of the boundaries of less-favoured areas within the meaning of Council Directive 75/268/EEC (France) (Only the French text is authentic) (81/408/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The list of less-favoured areas in France contained in the Annex to Directive 75/271/EEC is hereby amended as shown in the Annex hereto.
This Decision is addressed to the French Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 April 1981.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
